input-field.name: enableHeroBlockSlider
input-field.label: Hero Block Slider aktivieren
Enable Hero Block Slider
input-field.helpText: Aktiviert den Hero Block Slider in Erlebniswelten. Wenn deaktiviert, wird der Block nicht in der Block-Auswahl angezeigt.
Enables the Hero Block Slider in Shopping Experiences. If disabled, the block will not appear in the block selection.

input-field.name: enableHeroTwoColumns
input-field.label: Hero Two Columns Image & Text Block aktivieren
Enable Hero Two Columns Image & Text Block
input-field.helpText: Aktiviert den Hero Two Columns Image & Text Block mit Parallax-Scroll in Erlebniswelten. Wenn deaktiviert, wird der Block nicht in der Block-Auswahl angezeigt.
Enables the Hero Two Columns Image & Text block with parallax scroll in Shopping Experiences. If disabled, the block will not appear in the block selection.

input-field.name: enableHeroVideoExtended

Hero Video Extended block with headlines, text, and buttons. This block will be available in a future version.

input-field.name: enableHeroInstagramFeed

Enable Hero Instagram Feed Widget

Instagram feed integration for mega menu and custom blocks. Enables the Instagram Feed block in Shopping Experiences.

input-field.name: enableMegaMenu
input-field.label: Mega Menu Block aktivieren
Enable Mega Menu Block
input-field.helpText: Erweiterte Navigations-Blöcke mit Produkten, Widgets und Instagram Feed Support.
Advanced navigation block with products, widgets, and Instagram feed support.

input-field.name: enableCategorySlider
input-field.label: Hero Block Kategorie-Slider aktivieren

Enables the Hero Block Category Slider in Shopping Experiences. If disabled, the block will not appear in the block selection.

input-field.name: enableShoppingExperience
input-field.label: Shopping Experience Blocks aktivieren (In Entwicklung)
Enable Shopping Experience Blocks (In Development)

Additional custom blocks for enhanced shopping experiences. These blocks will be available in a future version.
